name: Lisa
what_you_do: Lisa Shawver is an entrepreneur and coach who helps others achieve success in business and life through her unique methodology called the 5 Rings of Success.
who_you_serve: She serves individuals and entrepreneurs looking to develop a growth mindset and actionable strategies to reach their full potential.
social_proof: Played softball in the Olympics for Puerto Rico, authored a children's book, and has experience in professional baseball.
